Key Match Events: Pakistan slipped from 155-2 to 191 all out
Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 36 runs
Post-Match Reflections: India's bowlers set up the game for them
Pakistan's collapse was a major issue
India's captain Rohit Sharma was pleased with the team's performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in Ahmedabad
India's victory extended their winning start in the World Cup
Others: The match was broadcast on BBC Radio 5 Sports Extra
